name: Arlo (Shwowsh)
description: Welcome to Cap City! As the last survivor of a corporate robot uprising, it’s time to stand up from your desk, quit your job, pull out your trusty flamethrower and burn it all down! In this adorable return to a classic pixel art 2d side scroller, it’s time to see how well grey, tedious and monotonous react to an irresponsible amount of gasoline.
